name: TV Kid
description:
TV Kid is an addicting roguelike clicker game with endless possibilities for item combinations!
Click through channel after channel and try to defeat television itself!

List of Features:

  • Every single run is completely randomized and different!
  • 100+ items to find and collect!
  • 3+ characters to unlock and play as!
  • 25+ monsters to find and defeat!
  • Includes a waifu body pillow!
